  • Constructor Details

    • QueryConfigurationBuilder

      public QueryConfigurationBuilder(@NotNull @NotNull DataSource dataSource)
      QueryConfigurationBuilder is a builder class used to create an instance of QueryConfiguration. It provides methods to configure various properties of the QueryConfiguration.

  • Method Details

    • setAtomic

      public QueryConfigurationBuilder setAtomic(boolean atomic)
      Sets the atomic flag for the QueryConfigurationBuilder.

      Default: true

      Parameters:
      atomic - the value to set the atomic flag to
      Returns:
      the QueryConfigurationBuilder instance

    • setThrowExceptions

      public QueryConfigurationBuilder setThrowExceptions(boolean throwExceptions)
      Sets the flag indicating whether exceptions thrown during database queries should be thrown or logged.
      Parameters:
      throwExceptions - flag indicating whether exceptions should be thrown (true) or logged (false)
      Returns:
      the QueryConfigurationBuilder instance

    • setExceptionHandler

      public QueryConfigurationBuilder setExceptionHandler(Consumer<SQLException> exceptionHandler)
      Sets the exception handler for handling SQLExceptions that may occur during database operations.

      Default: stdout

      Parameters:
      exceptionHandler - the consumer function that handles SQLExceptions
      Returns:
      the QueryConfigurationBuilder instance
